revision.text:
{{codepointer|Monster AI}} '''A_ClearLastHeard'''
(no parameters)
Makes the calling actor forget about the last thing it heard. This does not prevent it from hearing new things after the call, nor does it cause it to lose its target if it already has one (see [[A_ClearTarget]] for this).
This function is ineffective when {{c|[[compatibility options#compat_soundtarget|compat_soundtarget]]}} is active.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == * [[A_ClearSoundTarget]] * [[A_ClearTarget]]
